Row.Text: Greetings, friend. Our humble empire welcomes you, our culture cherishes the virtue of benevolence of the people.
Well met! My kingdom fights in the name of virtue. Shall we fight together for this ideal?
I seek a greater future, though you may not understand it. For the sake of that future, let us be met.
It seems that true benevolence could not be acheived after all.
It looks like all great empires were made to fall some day...
Now China shall never be united, such a shame...
What? You dare attack and destroy the benevolence? Foolish!
You have made a terrible mistake. Hopefully we will be able to imprint benevolence to you, even by force if necessary.
It looks like the benevolence would not reach out to you after all. Very well then.
It's time that the mighty army of Shu show no mercy!
The benevolence needs to be realized! Onwards!
Onwards, men! For benevolence!
Shu demands tribute for your lack of benevolence.
Care to give? It is for unity and benevolence after all.
I ask for this.
Perhaps I have lost war, however the benevolence of Shu will always live on!
That will not do! More is needed!
Still not enough! More!
This will not satisfy!
I know you are benevolent man, but I need more than this.
A bit shy, it seems? This is not enough.
No. Not quite enough.
As it stands now, your offer is unfair to my nation. Give more.
Can you do a little better?
That's not quite good enough.
A bit more...
One cannot trade with a person who does not understand benevolence. Now leave.
I am sorry, but I cannot accept this offer.
I refuse your offer.
For benevolence, I will take it.
May this agreement bring benevolence and prosperity to both our kingdoms.
Very well then. I accept your offer.
Here is what I need. Do you not defy benevolence?
You would do us a great honor by accepting this agreement.
Greetings. I believe that this will benefit both of our peoples. What do you say?
No, this will not do! Your very presence gives dishonor to my benevolence.
Sorry, however I must refuse your request
No thank you.
It does not seem as I if I have a choice in the matter. Now leave.
For benevolence, I can refuse you nothing.
Very well, it appears that I have no choice. But I shall avenge this; for benevolence!
This will not lead to benevolence.
Very well. The next time I shall not be so polite!
You have lost your reputation for this in the eyes of my people.
How very disappointing.
Indeed? I trust that you will not live to regret your short-sightedness.
How foolish of you.
You have lost against the might of Shu. Witness true benevolence!
Greetings, Comrade. Do you bring benevolence?
How did you get here? Well, now that you're here, what do you want?
Tell me you bring benevolence. If not, please leave.
If it is a war you want, then it is what you will get.
This land is a land of benevolence. You are not fir to take it.
For benevolence, I ask of you this.
You probably do not understand, but this trade shall be good for you.
You are a benevolent man and command a benevelent kingdom. May you open our borders to us?
